info.author: Arnaldo Russo
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
info.description:
PARpy
=====
**Photosynthetically Active Radiance - Python processing tool**

Processing tools of Satlantic Radiometer (HyperOCR Hyperspectral Radiometer), 
to obtain Photosynthetically Active Radiance.

This specific tool provides some specific modules to extract "Reference 
PAR hyperspectral" data and another module to filter PAR data by its 
respective Sun Elevation Angle, with Pysolar module.




History
-------

0.1.0 (2013-08-11)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
info.keywords: PAR Photosynthetically Active Radiance Light Solar Angle
info.name: PARpy
info.summary: Processing tool for PAR data of Satlantic Radiometers

Photosynthetically Active Radiance - Python processing tool

Processing tools of Satlantic Radiometer (HyperOCR Hyperspectral Radiometer), to obtain Photosynthetically Active Radiance.

This specific tool provides some specific modules to extract “Reference PAR hyperspectral” data and another module to filter PAR data by its respective Sun Elevation Angle, with Pysolar module.
